idea: Our company works on extracting the unadulterated potential of young children by providing them education to improve their brain development. Our aim is to inculcate a lifelong love for learning in our tiny tots. Though we cover a massive number of topics in class, our prime focus has always been skill-building.
name: TICKLE RIGHT EDUVENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Community Prism Pvt. Ltd.

About Us

Community Prism Pvt Ltd is a community-based company for learners, thinkers, developers, industry experts, etc. where people from diverse backgrounds gather on a one-point community-driven encyclopaedia for anything in technology where we are transforming global education with the help of collaborative learning.

This company in return renders every individual with a goal, we convert their goals into our own and help them curate a learning trajectory.

The education sector is brutal business now. Everyone is trying to sell cheap courses to get the possible revenue. But the quality of the education is suffering and hence it is producing more and more jobless and distressed professionals. Also, there are communities that are trying to fix the problem but it lacks vision, engagement, and most importantly satisfaction. We are here to change through open-sourcing education with the help of the community and collaborative learning. Basically giving power back to the people.

We take care of every individual’s motive for learning and help them curate a learning curve based on their interests and interactions with us.

We are an Intention, which caters to the world’s need providing a learning path to every individual of the community, with specialized mentors who understand each individual. We believe to learn together, meaning crowdsource content approved by industry experts which can help grow many individuals.

We are a family of mentors and mentees, where the content is shared by community members utilizing their knowledge of the content is created and consumed by the community with the right mentorship.

Vision

Community Prism Pvt Ltd is a global platform, where we believe in more practitioners and less noise

Our Mission

Our goal is to become a global encyclopaedia for technological reasoning, providing concise content with less noise for anyone to get started quickly and swiftly.

Our offerings

1. Project-Based Learning

2. Collaborative Learning

3. Workshop

4. Bootcamp

5. Talks

6. Meetups

7. Mock Interviews

8. Resume Review and Writing

9. Training
name: Community Prism Pvt Ltd
